_meta.description: Quest step tracking structure. Displayed by overlay.
_meta.note: ⚠️ Loaded dynamically by IronmanQuestingOverlay. Do not remove.

steps.description: Start as a female character, don't forget to make yourself an ironman before leaving tutorial island.
Use every book and lamp on Herblore UNTIL 77 herblore...
Use Authenticator AND 2-step verification on registered e-mail.
Sell bronze dagger, sword, axe, wooden shield and shortbow to the general store
Buy a spade, start X marks the spot quest
Drop your runes and ask for more from the magic tutor, pick up your runes
Pick up every item spawn in the castle, including the ones in cellar, don't forget the cabbage
Talk to the duke to start Rune mysteries quest
Go to the top of the castle, bank everything
